scripts.build:ui: @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force build && cd ../phoneboook_front/ && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item ./build -Recurse ../phonebook_back/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy:git: @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force node_modules && @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force package-lock.json && git add . && git commit -m Some_changes && git push
